name: Knight with Guns
description:
What is happening?

You are summoned by the magician to defeat evil creature but received some strange equipment and you have no idea how to use them. How does this guns work? 

How to play

WASD to select persistent direction. Carefully, you have limited movements!

Left mouse to shoot with your guns. That knight has no idea how to reload them!

R button to reload your gun queue. If you noticed that you are not getting any weapons, hit that button!

Credits

Code and Technical Part - Ludwintor

Art and Idea - chagnarfaugn

Music - https://soundcloud.com/tagsoup
